mapper.select: SELECT room_id FROM (SELECT cr.room_id FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_room_member crm1 ON cr.room_id = crm1.room_id JOIN chat_room_member crm2 ON cr.room_id = crm2.room_id WHERE crm1.ucode = #{ucode} AND crm2.ucode = #{friendUcode} AND cr.room_type = 'DIRECT' AND crm1.left_at is null AND crm2.left_at is null) WHERE rownum = 1

SELECT cr.room_id,cr.title,cr.create_at FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_room_member crm on cr.room_id = crm.room_id WHERE crm.ucode = #{ucode} AND cr.room_type = 'GROUP' AND crm.left_at is null ORDER BY crm.joined_at DESC

SELECT t.msg_id, t.room_id, t.sender_ucode, t.content, t.created_at, m.name AS sender_name FROM ( SELECT msg_id, room_id, sender_ucode, content, created_at FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY created_at DESC ) t JOIN member m ON t.sender_ucode = m.ucode WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} ORDER BY t.created_at ASC
SELECT ucode, id, name, icon, birth, email, phone FROM member WHERE ucode=#{friendUcode}
SELECT cm.ucode,m.id,m.name,cm.role FROM chat_room_member cm JOIN member m ON cm.ucode = m.ucode WHERE cm.room_id = #{roomId}
